use_cases.case: The Salmonella enterica Infantis N55391 genome (NZ_CP016410) was used as a reference sequence in core SNP-based phylogenetic analysis of recently sequenced and publicly available Salmonella Infantis genomes.
The Salmonella enterica Infantis N55391 genome (NZ_CP016410) was used to discover and analyze antibiotic resistance genes and point mutations involved in antimicrobial resistance in Salmonella.
